Staff, rare (requires attunement by a wizard)
This gold-shod staff is constructed out of a piece of masting from a galleon. The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants you a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While you are on board a ship, this bonus increases to +2.
The staff has 10 charges and regains 1d8 + 2 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff loses all of its magic and becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.
Spells. While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7fFHlBk3UNX8gPKL]{control water} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.IBJmWjzbQGu7M4UX]{fog cloud} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.FSMy6VAjDnXY9vWz]{gust of wind} (2 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.YBda6nLKjxdT1LbS]{water walk} (3 charges). You can also use an action to cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ctW81uiX56xZR2c5]{ray of frost} cantrip from the staff without using any charges.
